name: The Town of Clarity
description:
“We cant stop here its, crow country!”

Your vision is unstable, your heart is fluttering. You have to go through this town relying on unstable vision and your intuition. Don’t get tangled up in your feet.

Controls:

WASD if nothing else stated ;)

Our Team:

Ivan Pavlov,

Andreas Schule,

Scanax

Special Thanks to the author of the following songs used in this game: https://freemusicarchive.org/music/REW_1123

Press “E” to interact
